task.title: A demo file
task.shortdesc: Show how we can use tabs to provide a more compact editing environment.

taskbody.prereq: You need oXygen XML Editor or oXygen XML Author on a desktop, or you can use oXygen XML Web Author from a browser.
taskbody.context: Sometimes it is useful to present content in different tabs, thus you can focus on a specific category of information at a time and you get also a more compact rendering.

step.cmd: Start oXygen XML Editor or XML Author on a desktop, or go to the dashboard for the oXygen XML Web Author
Download this project files, in case you use the oXygen XML Editor or oXygen XML Author
Observe the tabs in the Author visual editing mode
Look at the task.less file to see how the tabs were created
